title: Blinkit UI - Premium E-Commerce App
shortDescription: Enterprise-grade Flutter e-commerce app with clean architecture, advanced UI/UX, and real-time delivery tracking.
description: Built a production-ready, enterprise-grade e-commerce mobile application inspired by Blinkit, India's leading instant delivery platform. Developed using Flutter with Clean Architecture and optimized state management, the app features OTP-based authentication, smart product search, dynamic category navigation, cart intelligence, personalized profiles, promotions, and real-time delivery tracking. Designed with Material Design 3.0, smooth animations, and cross-platform optimizations for iOS and Android, this project demonstrates scalable architecture, premium UI/UX, and business-driven functionality.

title: Portfolio Website
shortDescription: A modern portfolio website to showcase developer skills and projects.
description: A fully responsive portfolio website built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion. Features animated sections, project gallery, and contact form.

title: E-commerce Platform
shortDescription: A scalable e-commerce platform with product catalog and checkout.
description: Built a robust e-commerce platform using React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Includes user authentication, product management, and secure payments.

title: Team Collaboration App
shortDescription: A real-time team collaboration tool for remote teams.
description: A web app for real-time chat, file sharing, and task management. Built with Next.js, Firebase, and Material UI for a seamless user experience.

title: Smart City Environmental Monitoring
shortDescription: AI-powered platform for real-time environmental analytics and intelligent alerts.
description: An enterprise-grade full-stack platform delivering real-time weather analytics, AQI tracking, predictive modeling, and intelligent alerts. Built with React.js, Node.js, Python (Flask), and MongoDB, it integrates machine learning for 24-hour forecasting, ApexCharts for dynamic visualizations, and JWT-secured authentication. Features live dashboards, heatmaps, automated email alerts, offline-ready data handling, and scalable microservices for smart cities, agriculture, and compliance systems.

title: Lals â€” AI-Powered E-Commerce Platform
shortDescription: Intelligent, scalable chocolate e-commerce platform with AI chatbot and real-time order tracking.
description: Engineered a full-stack, enterprise-level chocolate e-commerce platform with AI chatbot support, real-time order tracking, secure checkout, admin analytics, PDF invoice generation with download, and cloud deployment. Built using Node.js, MongoDB, EJS, WebSockets, and NLP.js, this solution demonstrates my ability to deliver scalable, secure, and intelligent web applications that drive business growth and deliver seamless user experiences.

title: AI-Powered Portfolio Creator
shortDescription: Full-stack MERN application enabling users to create responsive, SEO-ready portfolios instantly.
description: Built a full-stack MERN application that empowers users to generate responsive, SEO-friendly portfolios in minutes. Features include dynamic template engine, live preview, Netlify deployment, JWT authentication, admin dashboard, Redis caching, Cloudinary optimization, and a modern UI/UX powered by Vite and Tailwind CSS. Delivered with scalable architecture, blazing performance, and mobile-first design.

title: Modern Beverage Storefront
shortDescription: Premium Next.js + Strapi e-commerce platform with secure payments and advanced CMS features.
description: Developed a premium full-stack e-commerce platform using Next.js (App Router), TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Strapi CMS with seamless PayPal integration. Features include a dynamic cart with React Context, a responsive product catalog, blazing-fast SSG pages, an animated UI, and enterprise-level SEO. Delivered a scalable, mobile-first, high-performance shopping experience with secure payments and advanced CMS-driven product management.

title: Hotel Finder â€” Full-Featured Flutter App for Modern Hostel Management
shortDescription: Flutter-based mobile app connecting hostel owners with students and travelers.
description: Hotel Finder is a Flutter-based mobile app connecting hostel owners with students and travelers. It features secure Firebase authentication, profile management, and real-time hostel listings via Firestore. Owners can upload images using Image Picker, while Shared Preferences ensure smooth offline use. Integrated Google Maps and Geolocator offer precise location search, with GetX for efficient state management and cached images for fast, optimized performance.

title: Full-Stack Food App â€” React Native & Firebase with Stunning Modern UI
shortDescription: Complete food ordering app with smooth UX, email verification, and API integration.
description: Designed and developed a complete food ordering app from landing page to checkout using React.js. Delivered a pixel-perfect, fully responsive UI with smooth UX across all screens. Integrated Nodemailer for user verification and order confirmation emails. Managed API integration flawlessly and implemented a high-end, modern UI that enhances engagement. Built to showcase real-world, production-level front-end expertise.
